name: n8n
description: deploy n8n to heroku without any hassle

N8N_BASIC_AUTH_ACTIVE.description: Protect n8n setup with basic authentication.

GENERIC_TIMEZONE.description: Time Zone to use with Heroku. You can find the name of your timezone here: https://momentjs.com/timezone/

N8N_BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD.description: Basic Authentication Password to secure n8n.

N8N_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: This is to set the n8n encryption key to a static value, so that heroku doesnt override it, causing AUTH to fail

PGSSLMODE.description: Heroku made a change so SSL is required to connect to Postgres

NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED.description: Because Heroku SSL is self signed, SSL fails if this is not set to 0
